mapper.select: select * from (select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rn, H.h_id, H.h_name, H.h_phone, H.h_email1, H.h_email2, H.deputy_name, H.deputy_phone, H.deputy_birth, H.deputy_department, I.hostInfo_name, I.h_code, R.room_code, I.h_sellerNum, I.h_accountNum, I.zipcode, I.roadAddress, I.numberAddress, I.restAddress, I.host_type, R.room_type, R.room_number, R.room_fee, R.able_checkIn, R.able_checkOut, R.title, R.content, R.room_status, R.min_number, R.max_number, R.bed_type, R.bed_count, R.bath_count, R.party_check, R.kitchen, R.wifi, R.parking, R.tv, R.refrigerator, R.hairdryer, R.washer, R.pet, R.pickup, R.dryer, R.elevator, R.barbecue, R.pool, R.aircon, R.heater, R.smoking, R.creDate, R.del_yn from h_host H inner join h_host_info I on H.h_id = I.h_id inner join h_room R on I.h_code = R.h_code , (select @rownum := 0) as rowcolumn order by creDate desc) z where rn >= #{startNO} and rn <= #{endNO};
SELECT count(*) total FROM h_host H inner join h_host_info I on H.h_id = I.h_id inner join h_room R on I.h_code = R.h_code

select H.h_id, H.h_name, H.h_phone, H.h_email1, H.h_email2, H.deputy_name, H.deputy_phone, H.deputy_birth, H.deputy_department, I.h_code, R.room_code, I.hostInfo_name, I.h_sellerNum, I.h_accountNum, I.zipcode, I.roadAddress, I.numberAddress, I.restAddress, I.host_type, R.room_type, R.room_number, R.room_fee, R.able_checkIn, R.able_checkOut, R.title, R.content, R.room_status, R.min_number, R.max_number, R.bed_type, R.bed_count, R.bath_count, R.party_check, R.kitchen, R.wifi, R.parking, R.tv, R.refrigerator, R.hairdryer, R.washer, R.pet, R.pickup, R.dryer, R.elevator, R.barbecue, R.pool, R.aircon, R.heater, R.smoking, R.creDate, R.del_yn from h_host H inner join h_host_info I on H.h_id = I.h_id inner join h_room R on I.h_code = R.h_code where R.room_code = #{room_code};
